Scanned with OKEN ScannerNature of Land:
Government has obtained the title deed from them and they have received receipt No. 201156664520323 from the Housing Development Corporation confirming that there are no dues on the house site which is in the possession of the claimant for more than 10 years.
The Government has decided to register this document with the intention of granting full and permanent rights to the land plots enjoyed by the applicants or heirs under the Jagannana Purna Gruha Haak Scheme.
Subject to section 3 (24) and Section 3 (2B) of the AP Assigned Lands (POT) (AMENDMENT); and in accordance with GO MS no 314, Revenue (Lands-I) Department, dated 11/11/2021, this document is hereby issued.
Therefore, from now on, you can freely enjoy the said Scheduled Property up to your descendants with the powers of donation, exchange, sale and transfer. If you do so, neither the Government of Andhra Pradesh nor their representatives will have any claim or dispute against you, your heirs or your representatives in the future. You will have to pay all taxes payable on the said immovable property in your name. Government of Andhra Pradesh

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL:DURGADA/DURGADA W-B: 4-0 SURVEY: 347/1HOUSE:4-4/ EXTENT:72.014SQ.Yds BUILT:482SQ. FT Boundires: [N]:ROAD [S] GOLLAPALLISEETAYYA [E]:GOLLAPALLI SUBBARAO[W]: ROAD

sections.content:
The property covered under Sale deed No. 168024 of 2022, dated 10/Mar/2022, executed by Government of Andhra Pradesh represented by its Gollaprolu Tahsildar Vakada Ammaji, in favour of Gollapalli Ammulu, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 133.3333 sq.Yds., bearing house number 4-, comprised in survey number 347/1, situated in Kodavali Village & Grama Panchayati, Gollaprolu Mandal, within the District of Kakinada, registered at sub-registrar office Pithapuram, is bounded as follows:

North by: Road
South by: Gollapalli Seetayya
East by: Gollapalli  Subbarao
West by: Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the scheduled property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: 1. It is observed from the recitals of the deed that the SRO Name is mentioned as Durgada-2, whereas, the document is registered before the SRO Pithapuram, it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to verify the same. 2. The EC has been verified and downloaded using the Survey Number parameter as the option to retrieve EC records using the House address & Document Parameters is currently unavailable in the Online EC portal. 3. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
